team_id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

permission.description: The permission to grant the team on this repository. If no permission is specified, the team's `permission` attribute will be used to determine what permission to grant the team on this repository.
